headline: Analyst Sentiment on Verizon Communications (VZ) Improves Amid Steadier Growth and Defensible Cash Flows
summary: Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) is one of the most undervalued blue chip stocks to buy now. As of January 7, 2026, roughly 40% of analysts covering Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE:VZ) are bullish. The consensus price target is $46.50, representing a 15.40% upside. However, the analyst confidence appears to be growing with the company’s network-led strategy […]
